name: Miriam Sachs
text: The food and customer service were both excellent. The employees were very friendly and noticed it was my first time here and welcomed me. The pizza has a very thin crust and is more like an open faced sandwich, but it still tastes great.

name: Mikel Woods
text: Blaze pizza is amazing. The price of their pies are reasonable. Oh and if you go in to the store with the little ones the staff always give them cookies.

name: Dawn McCoy
text: First time going to Blaze Pizza.  I was a little confused about how it all worked.  But an employee helped direct me to the ordering line.  I was mistakenly at the cash register, which is the last step.  So  if you're new to Blaze Pizza …More

name: James J Girard
text: I'd rate the quality of the food and customer service as excellent and beyond expectations. I went to blaze and traveled an hour from Atlantic City just to have some of their delicious pizza just to find out that the store wasnt having any …More

name: Ve Ra
text: This is a must visit place at least once. You can customize your pizza with any number of toppings you like our choose from their menu. Refreshing drinks available. Mix and match sauces worth toppings to find your perfect combination. Service here is quick and excellent.

name: A'Nyah Williams-Leonard
text: Shanice and Anthony were awesome! Quick service & great attitudes. Will be coming back soon!!

name: Christopher Arnold
text: I love this place! As a vegan, I love that they are considerate in the small details such as asking do you want a glove change before creating your pizza or making sure that they are using the correct pizza cutter once it comes out of the …More

name: Laura Biles
text: Came in to try their pizza since I've heard so many good things and wasn't disappointed. The pizza was amazing and the staff was even better. My son has autism and the manager Tim made his visit. It was nice to see somebody go that extra mile and really care about his experience. You've gained a customer for life!

name: Rebecca
text: I always enjoy stopping at Blaze for a bite to eat. I have dietary restrictions and the staff always makes it a point to accommodate me, Oz in particular. He lights up the room and always makes the experience more enjoyable. The pizza is amazing, would absolutely recommend.

name: Honest Review Guy
text: Service can be hit or miss. Food is hot fresh and delicious. Staff give out free cups to their friends.

name: Alexander Marcopolus
text: Pizza here was great. There are plenty of toppings and ingredients to choose from to build your own pizza here. The price isn't bad and even during busy hours, the wait is definitely worth it for the food. I've been here several times and have no been disappointed. The staff is almost always very nice and friendly as well.

name: Sherin Joy
text:
Caption: Protein pizza ( around $13) awesome 😻.
I tried couple of other pizzas from here as well. This is a low carbohydrate pizza. I thought, since it is a diet pizza it won’t taste much but it was awesome …More

name: Backlash Back
text: Amazing and courteous staff. They kept up with the hard work and got all of us our dinner in spite of a crazy rush. Management should take notice and reward them. Kudos to Joy and Rafiq, Dame, Jabber and Lawrence for being an awesome team and host

name: REGINA J BROWN
text: First time ordering pizza from Blaze. Delivery was super fast and the pizza was absolutely delicious. I had an opportunity to speak with the manager Timothy Trunk. He was so pleasant and made me feel like a valued customer.

name: Sh alshamsi
text: Fresh delicious food. Good staff, and beautiful experience.

name: Sara Sawant
text: The morning crew was really great. Everyone was very friendly and helpful. I got my food quickly and it tasted great! Definitely will come here more especially in the mornings

name: Rishi Palan
text: Had heard a lot of great things, but the place didn't live up to its hype. Took me about 25 minutes to get my order - suggest ordering via app upfront. Tried the veggie pizza - was average. Not a huge fan of their classic red sauce either.

name: Shanice Maloney
text: The Pizza was great. Fresh dough and toppings. The Fruit juices were a little too sweet for my taste but if you like a lot of sugar in your fruit juices it would be great. The coconut milk juice is nasty.

name: Bryan Suchenski
text: Solid custom pizzas. The ingredients are fresh and there's good variety, plus they have interesting drinks like blood orange lemonade. You can get a whole pizza pretty cheap and quick. I tend to go for the green stripe (chicken pesto), and add Brussels sprouts when they're in season, and I've never regretted it.

name: LaFiqqa
text: Blaze make really good pizzas. I haven’t went once when the pizza wasn’t tasteful, especially when Oz is there. I like my pizza not to hard but not to soft and he makes it right every time. Plus he has great customer service.

name: Krzysztof Leśniak
text: I found this place on Google. Pizza tastes really good. Nice service (thanks Oz). I will definitely come back.

name: Thomas Hampel
text: Love all the pies and they are always fresh tasting!

name: Deborah Long
text: Build your own is the way to go. Fresh ingredients, lots of options, reasonable prices, friendly service.

name: jose gordillo
text:
Week after week they dont ever fail to impress me!
Every time i walk in there Oz is very welcoming with a great attitude!
I know that when ever i walk in here, i will always be presented with great service.

name: Alan Beltran
text: Great food and a good vibe! Not as many options as I had hoped for (though it should be noted that there were quite a lot and enough to be throughly customizable) but the product turned out delicious anyway! I also appreciated it having Mexican coke and appetizing desserts!

name: Dawn Brice
text: My first time and I'm definitely going back . I ordered the White Top w/broccoli it was delicious! I love the thin crust, I love how it's made to order and only takes a few minutes. Great service,  friendly staff , great variety of …More

name: Alfa Lopez
text: Great food and service! Always satisfied when I come here. Whenever I come Oz has a great attitude and makes my meal more enjoyable

name: Jeff Szczepanik
text: Nice thin charred crust pizza. Excellent sauce and ample toppings. Also, if you're in a hurry, the service is very fast.

name: Joel Bolling
text: Good pizza, but horrible customer service. They claimed not to have items they clearly had (salad and garlic knots). We saw them throw some dough on the floor (they did not use it), yell at a customer for trying to sit upstairs, and had …More

name: Gaurav Shah
text: Awesome pizza parlour!

name: Enrique Sherwood Caballero
text: Jasmin Alfreda and Chris were all excellent the times I have been here! Cracking jokes and all. And the pizza here tastes amazing. Would recommend. Coming from a Penn student.

name: Alliyah Rose
text: Staff was great last night someone named Mia made my pizza with great customer service and Chris always cooks it just right. 100% recommend eating here for anybody who is looking for a quick bite. Their personal pizzas are enjoyable

name: Damon Andres
text: This pizza is great.   Staff is awesome , too.    And always very quick so can get great food even when in a hurry.   Love this place.

name: Becky Bennett
text: Nice salad options.loved  the pizza crust. Green stripe (chicken pesto) didn't have a lot of taste from the toppings though, i wish i had gotten something else.  Very fast though.

name: Claire Marchant-Williams
text: Unique experience - a cross between subway & pizza hut! The staff were patient with the confused Brit who had no idea! The pizza was tasty and freshly made.

name: Benjamin Wodatch
text: Excellent customer service. Employees are extremely nice and move at a fast pace. Delicious pizza.

name: Rajeev Nunna
text: Pizza was great and Oz gave me the best customer service. I'll definitely be back soon.

name: ARUSHA ACHARYYA
text: The pizza is great and cheap. The people are really nice. I usually customize my pizza and the best thing is you can add as many toppings as you want without extra cost. Me and my friends also love the mango drink from the jar. It's sweet and refreshing. Good place for vegetarian options.

name: Chelsea Madison
text: The morning crew was amazing! My food was ready super fast, the taste was great and everyone was friendly!

name: Fiddle Pants
text: Great deal, fully customizable pizza for $10. Friendly staff in the morning. Eyes always on point

name: M Chase
text: The cauliflower crust is fire. Didnt miss anything.  The staff was patient and informative.  .Also the location design was lovely.

name: Josh Mcginnis
text: This place is solid. It's nice to have pizza so accessible and quick. They serve substantial portions too and have lots of options. The food is a bit on the salty side of things and you end up paying more because you have to get a fairly large personal pizza with no real options to go smaller. Good vegetariation pizza options though!

name: Abla
text: As a vegetarian, very picky about pizza places. Great place for vegetarian/vegans though but using same hands to browse meats then veggies defeats purpose of having great options. Otherwise not bad.

name: Edward Bombaro
text: Blaze Pizza was alright, middle of the road pizza.  Although it's nice they make the pizza 'fresh' in front if you, its sort of put together in the way they make hoagies at quick serve chain 'sub' places.  They are around the same price as …More

name: Mr Ross
text: Was greeted by a friendly employee who explained the options for pizza. Kind of like a pizza version of Subway. We placed our order and it was ready promptly. The guy getting it ready for us could have nicer, was kind of gruff. Pizza was …More

name: Jeffrey Pursell
text: It was good and fast. Everything was easy and my socially awkward friend Tommy was able to order his food without problems.

name: Jni Min
text: Absolutely delicious! Excellent customer service.

name: Nicki Jones
text: Great customer service. Oz is super friendly and remembers me every time I come in. Oh and the pizza is A1.

name: Christina Baker
text: This was my first time visiting and they were amazing. I forgot to take my card off lock, so when I was charged for my pizzas it cancelled my card! Blaze pizza manager gave me the pizzas on the house and saved my night. I owe them! The pizza was great as well, even better as leftovers  🙄

name: Redis Washington
text: I’m very disappointed in Blaze pizza. I came to the Lancaster avenue location 3-4 times within the last week to get a pizza and the location either closed ahead of time or “ran out” of cheese. What pizza shop runs out of cheese???? Please do better and get staff that wants to work!!!!

name: Suzanna Ho
text: Excellent service and great pizzas. Their morning crew is super nice!

name: Charles Oneill
text: Came in tonight around 10 with some friends, not many toppings left but im a simple person so it didnt bother me. Great customer service today, mia made my pizza and rung me up and she has great service. The dude who cooked my pizza i think …More

name: Mee Lin Youk
text: The pizza is the bomb the price nice and the cashier Oz was especially  personable  and hospitable...

name: Stephanie Cugine
text: Food is constantly good, quick, and filled with great staff (Oz at the register is awesome)!

name: Jeremy Moore
text:
Second time eating here, and this place is awesome.
The crew was on the ball and worked together to quickly and efficiently take and make orders.

name: Sean McClellan
text: I love blaze. It's always a nice place to go when I am in a rush, but if I want to sit down with some friends, it's perfect for that too. Even with the speedy service, the quality is always what keeps me coming back. On top of that, I …More

name: Tire Town West
text: The pizza doe was good thank u to the cooks

name: Srikumar Chari
text: Made to order pizza. The choices seemed about the same as their competition. It's hard to distinguish as they all have the same set of ingredients, add-ons, etc. Good for a quick bite if you are close by. It is self service.

name: Tarina Fountain
text: First time here, I got the Keto crust build your own pizza and it was absolutely Amazing!!!!! Amazing service, especially from Alfreda and Corey. I definitely found my new pizza place

name: 호호아줌마

very thin pizza with various fresh topping.
you can enjoy your own pizza
price is good …More

text: OZ was a good guy. He took care of me when I didn’t have money and I recommend this place to anyone, the pizza is very tasty. 👍🏽

name: Nate Wooding
text: We ate upstairs (I'm not a bottom feeder) and both the agua fresca and white top pizza I had we're good as frick.

name: Mark Budd
text: Rafiq, jabar,Dame, and  Shon are my guys they work hard and represent blaze the right way. They are strongly intertwined in the Drexel community!!

name: Mark Albini
text: Great price considering what you can get. I suggest building your own pizza and loading it up. Decent drinks and the s'mores pie is good but make sure you have them heat it up first

name: Bianca Goenawan
text: Pizza was absolutely delicious but you better be ready to deal with the horrible customer service. I had a pesto garlic with mozarella, mushroom, spicy chorizo, basic, spinach, roasted garlic and oregano. I love how the crust was crispy but …More

name: Matthew Hofmann
text: Can sometimes be an annoying place because of the service. But the pizza is pretty consistently good. Especially if you want a margherita pizza (called Red Vine on the menu). …More

name: baby kale
text: The food is amazing everything fresh and the customer service is everything. Oz is a great worker well mannered and respectful always smiling and is never afraid to ask a customer is there anything you need or what can I help you with. Keep up the great work!!!!

name: Tarang Bipin
text: Good place, good 🍕

name: Carl Love
text: This is by far the best pizza that I've ever had, and I've been eating pizza for over 50 years. I eat it whenever I come to Drexel University. The staff always treated me well, especially Oz. …More

name: quindara manson
text: The pizza okay its crispy but burnt

name: Chris R
text: Great place, great staff. Been here before and was amazed how busy they are but how fast the knock out the line. Restaurant was really clean and the staff attentive, I would have given the place 5 stars  but they guys with beards, they don’t wear beard nets, but thats it.

name: Pascal Marcellus
text: Blaze app = free pizza. Convenience and pretty fast turn around for your pie. Great staff and so many toppings to choose. I love topping my pizza with balsamic drizzle and arugula. Can't wait to go back for Pie Day!

name: Ed Amaba
text: Amazing place!The morning team is bomb!!

name: Niequan Moore
text: The pizza here is amazing! It is such a value and the quality beats most established pizza joints in Philly! I had a build your own a pizza w pesto and olive oil, brocc, basil, garlic, red peppers, red onions, and kalamatas. It was already …More

name: Colleen Sears
text: I love this location! Oz is awesome! He’s always so hospitable and friendly, which makes the experience better. The pizza is so good, and they make it just how I like it.

name: Satya Shroff
text: Always a great experience coming to this specific Blaze pizza. The service is fast and efficient and always puts a smile on my face before I even eat especially OZ who's always bringing the mood up. The food quality is excellent …More

name: sunshine gates trillone
text: Very good build your own pizza

name: Xuanyu Shi
text: Pizzas are fantastic. Fresh and and hot. Staff are welcoming! Oz makes me laugh all the time!

name: Charlie Hakeem

name: Andrew Chen
text: Great pizza! Oz grave great service. Would come again!

name: Erin Wohler
text: Out of a lot of items which you don't know until after ordering. Also the employee starting the order could be friendlier.

name: Monroe Garms
text: There is no excuse for your pizza not to be exactly what you want. With the build your own option. Red Vine!!! AWESOME!! VEGAN FRIENDLY....

name: Michael Woc
text: Very slow, orders are made out of order. A group of us ordered through the app at separate times and received our orders not in the same order they were ordered. They were ordered within 5 minutes of each other, but made 20 minutes apart. Staff also seemed lost and disorganized.

name: Conrad Bormann
text: This place is great! I walked in with my friend and they literally gave me a free pizza!

name: Dill Gods
text: I love it here! The best pizza place in Philly! All the workers are nice and friendly especially Oz he’s always very nice when me and my family come here to eat!

name: David Sale
text: Let me start off by saying if I made this review a few months ago it would not been so great. I had an awful experience last time but decided to give them another chance. What a difference a few months can make. Everything was clean, the …More

name: Mitasvil Patel
text: Worst place.. they didn’t had onions, garlic and other veggies. The cashier was rude and refused to take 2 orders in a single one just because I was using a coupon for one. The line was stretching out of the door as they had only 3 people …More

name: Ethan DeMilo
text: Top tier pizza with awesome customer service. Oz is awesome.

name: Lisa Rodgers
text: Their food is so good. I ordered the build your own pizza and it came out perfectly toasted and delicious! Recieved excellent customer service from Joy & Hakeem! Definitely going back.

name: Chaitali Bhadiadra
text: Great ambiance and zza's with generous amount of toppings!

name: monster's mommy
text: Great food & friendly service! Thanks Oz and the morning shift!

name: Arnaldo Duran
text: The pizzas here are very good.

name: Mike Fenwick
text: I am in Blaze about once a week for dinner. The food and staff are great! Oz goes out of his way to personally greet me each time I am in the restaurant. This will continue to be one of my regular spots.

name: Marianna Lambros
text: Blaze offers an interactive and fun dining experience like no other. I always receive my delicious pie in a timely manner, and especially enjoy interacting with the personable staff while I wait. Angie, in particular, always greets me by …More

text: Hi I'm Edwina Mckinney when i went there to eat with my younger sin... Hakeem McKinney made the best pizza and the services was great 5 stars from me.. Great job guys

name: michael heffner
text: Pizza is pretty good and a whole byo Pizza is reasonably priced.

Best pizza ever!

name: Peter Nguyen
text: Unfortunately I need to switch my review to a one star. I attempted to go back and received horrible customer service. I attempted to contact the franchisee and corporate, both of which were difficult and straight up ignored me. …More

name: Nicole Vaynshtok
text: Came here because I heard they had keto crust. I enjoyed customizing my own pizza (no extra charge per topping), dealt with all the friendly staff and they have strawless cups here. I'm definitely coming back for more. Each pizza is the perfect portion size for one person.

name: Kate Kempf
text: Delicious! Friendly people & a cool interior

boom pizza

text: Oz was amazing! Every time I visit this location he makes it fun & I leave smiling! Thanks!

name: Eric John

text: Good staff, decent service. Oz, Lil, Branden, Jaz, and Dame are always friendly and courteous. Management needs work though

text: It Was Double Flames Day in Saturday which Was Great. Though something Is Wrong with the Crust. It Tasted Like Cardboard & it Never Ever Was like that in Al the Years I've been Buying & Eating @ the 34th & Lancaster Ave. Location. Get On the Ball or You Will Lose Me & Other Customers soon.

name: Zach Parnell
text: Blaze was always in the running to be my favorite pizza on the planet. This last time I went Jessica and Melissa helped me make the best custom pizza ever. They totally livened up my day with their beautiful smiles and demeanor. I’ll be back because of these two humans!

text: Good service, decent price. Cant complain

name: Sima Toler

name: Joshua Fortune
text: Great food with an even greater staff! My coworkers & I love the place and ALL the employees no matter the shift. Always willing to help plus they make sure you leave with a smile...........(UPDATE)7 months later even with some of the staff …More

text: My experience at blaze pizza was amazing great customer service and amazing food. All the food taste asmazing and fresh and if you seem a little unsure on what you wasn’t at the moment they are so willing to help you and make sure you get what you want .

name: Chris Lewis
text: Great thin-crust pizza with a selection of signature recipes and an option to build your own. You get to choose from around 6 cheeses and a comprehensive topping spread including chrry tomatoes, kalamata olives, basil, artichoke, and pickled peppers.
